CustomField.description: Formula field used in email templates to the AE and Sales Engineer to display whether the Technical Update checkbox field is checked or not.
CustomField.formula: IF( Technical_Update__c, "A Technical Update is required. You will be updated within 48 hours.", ".")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: System Maintained Field: Used in email templates to display whether the Technical Update checkbox field is checked or not.
CustomField.label: Technical Update Verbiage AESE
